savedDays.description: Toast message for successful retention days update.

screenshotDownloadFailed.description: Error message for screenshot download failures.

importModePrompt.description: Prompt asking the user to choose between replacing or merging notes during import.

invalidVideoIdForMerge.description: Error message when attempting to merge video-specific notes for a different video ID.

invalidVideoIdForReplace.message: Cannot replace notes for different videos. Imported notes are for video $IMPORTED_VIDEO_ID$ but current video is $CURRENT_VIDEO_ID$.
invalidVideoIdForReplace.description: Error message when attempting to replace video-specific notes for a different video ID.

notesMergeSuccess.description: Toast message shown when notes are merged successfully.

notesMergeError.description: Error message for notes merging failures.

notesImportError.description: General error message for notes import failures.

importVideoIdMismatch.message: Imported notes are for video $IMPORTED_VIDEO_ID$ but current video is $CURRENT_VIDEO_ID$. Import cancelled.
importVideoIdMismatch.description: Error message when imported notes video ID does not match current video ID.

switchTheme.description: Tooltip/label for the theme switch button.

globalImportNotAllowedHere.description: Error message when a global notes import is attempted from the sub-toolbar.
